raw_body: Beloved husband of Premela, loving father of Dr. Deepa, Ramani, Anusha and Chandika and father-in-law of Dr. Jude, Noel, Bernard and Thabeetha, grandfather of Udara, Gihan, Dilan, Nikesha, Dilushi, Avani, Haresh, Chiara and Tiana. Remains will lie at Residence No. 56, Negombo Road, Tudella, Ja-Ela from 11.30 a.m. onwards on Wednesday 1st of May 2024. Thereafter remains will be at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour on Thursday 2nd May 2024 from 10.30
